1.1.name: wordpress/yocter-community-profile-for-wordpress
1.1.description:
Yocter Community Profile for WordPress displays a Widget that shows the latest message from any public Profile in any Yocter Community. If you are looking for a widget that shows latest updates in Yocter Community Discussions, use the yocter-community-discussion-for-wordpress plugin. Features

*  Simply
*  Customizable
*  Widget support
*  No options page (yes, its a feature)
*  Uses Wordpress resources (no extra files needed)

Usage

If you use WordPress widgets, just drag the widget into your sidebar and configure. Be sure to have activated the plugin in your Plugin Settings.
